sentences.en: And you can see with our Photon Cannons back online.
sentences.cn: 你看到了我们的炮台又恢复了对敌攻击.

sentences.en: As with the photon, material particles can be created and destroyed.
sentences.cn: 象光子一样, 实物粒子也可以产生和毁灭.

sentences.en: By recording each photon , she actually destroys what she is measuring.
sentences.cn: 读取每个光子, 实际上也是其破坏光子上信息的过程.

sentences.en: Does photon dispel spot have after all without effect?
sentences.cn: 光子祛斑到底有无副作用?

sentences.en: During the transience the electron and photon populations deviate slightly from their equilibrium values respectively.
sentences.cn: 在瞬态过程中,电子和光子的密度各稍微偏离其平衡值.

sentences.en: Go to beauty parlour doing safety of operation of photon tender skin?
sentences.cn: 去美容院做光子嫩肤手术安全 吗 ?

sentences.en: Photon energy can be equated to the chi necessary to sustain life.
sentences.cn: 光子能量可与支撑生命所需的chi相等同.

sentences.en: Some of the energy intended for the photon is drained off by the recoiling atom.
sentences.cn: 原来给予光子的能量有一部分为反冲原子所消耗.

sentences.en: The energy of the photon gives its color, or wavelength.
sentences.cn: 光子的能量决定了光子的颜色, 也就决定了它的波长.

sentences.en: The light from these dim objects arrives at a trickle of only one photon per minute in each square centimeter.
sentences.cn: 当这些昏暗物体发出的光抵达地球，在每平方公分内每分钟只有一个光子。

sentences.en: The multiple elastic scattering of photon can effectively enhance the gain length.
sentences.cn: 光子和散射颗粒的多次弹性散射可以增大有效增益长度.

sentences.en: The original ( real or virtual ) photon is re - created.
sentences.cn: 原来的光子 ( 实的或虚的 ) 再度产生.

sentences.en: The quantum of light is called a photon.
They are permanent as a photon is not.
sentences.cn: 它们是永恒的,而光子则不然.

sentences.en: This in turn left its mark on the polarization of the next photon, so amplifying the signal.
sentences.cn: 光子就这样轮流地将它的偏振标记留给下一个光子，因而增强了信号。

sentences.en: This is the energy of an ultraviolet photon, a "large" energy on the atomic scale .
sentences.cn: 这是一个紫外光子的能量，在原子尺度上，它是一个“大”能量。

sentences.en: To appreciate this behaviour let's examine the dynamics associated with the odyssey of our single photon.
sentences.cn: 为了看出这一性质,我们来考察与这个单个光子的征程相联系的动力学.

sentences.en: When an atom shoots out a photon of light, it recoils like a gun.
sentences.cn: 原子发出光子时, 会象枪一样地反冲.

words.tran_cn: 测光的；光度计的；光度测定的
光度计的；光测量的；光度学的（等于photometric）

trans.tran_en: a unit of  energy  that carries light and has  zero mass
